title: Print, "Charpente du Feu d'Artifice, plan et élévation [Structure for Fireworks, Plan and Elevation], plate 117 in Oeuvres de Juste-Aurele Meissonnier [Works of Juste-Aurele Meissonnier]", 1748
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J. A. Meissonnier inv.; lower right: Riolet Sculp.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper right: 113; lower center: Projet du Plan et Elevation de la charpente du Feu sur l'eau pour le mariage de Me. Premiere / Huquier ex. rue St. Jacque C.P.R.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Charpente du Feu d'Artifice, plan et élévation [Structure for Fireworks, Plan and Elevation], plate 117 in Oeuvres de Juste-Aurele Meissonnier [Works of Juste-Aurele Meissonnier]", 1748.
1748. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-212-70.
